meanings.definition: Constituting or presenting a problem or difficulty
meanings.sent1: The broken computer was problematic for the student.
meanings.sent2: The leaky roof was a problematic issue for the homeowner.
meanings.sent3: It was quite problematic when the cat chased the mouse in circles.
meanings.sent4: The problematic puzzle of life seemed unsolvable at times.
meanings.sent5: The problematic math question stumped the entire class.

meanings.definition: Involving or causing problems or difficulties
meanings.sent1: The problematic situation required immediate attention.
meanings.sent2: The problematic relationship led to many arguments.
meanings.sent3: It was quite problematic when the dog stole the sandwich.
meanings.sent4: The problematic road construction caused traffic delays.
meanings.sent5: The problematic decision resulted in unforeseen consequences.

meanings.sent1: The scientific theory was considered problematic by some experts.
meanings.sent2: The politician's statement was seen as problematic by the public.
meanings.sent3: It was quite problematic when the weather forecast turned out to be wrong.
meanings.sent4: The problematic evidence left room for interpretation.
meanings.sent5: The problematic argument raised questions among the audience.
